html:
10.23.19  2:55 pm   Mr Bill,
Are you feeling musical again?

     more and more all the time

      Or was I might quit the final foray?

     barely even started yet. wait what the heck is a foray

10.23.19  2:16 pm   What are your main musical influences?

     the sunrise. wait no, the time just before the sunrise i mean. fuck sunrise, by then it's already too late

10.23.19  1:17 pm   Whens the next vid

     i'm doing a countdown timer

10.23.19  1:17 pm   i think it is pretty cool to release a batch of content all at once, especially unannounced and when you already have lots of fans that are wishing for more content. it just sort of feels like, from a viewer perspective, like there was nothing......  more nothing... and then some more nothing.... and then BAM LET THERE BE LIGHT. it feels very thrilling for that to happen in my opinion.

     that's true, i've definitely done that before

10.23.19  1:13 pm   are you ever going to go on tour?

     yes

10.23.19  1:11 pm   I wrote this question during class, do you think I should go back to work?

     you could level up

10.23.19  12:34 pm   how do airplanes work

      one button for up, and one button for down, and a modifier button which temporarily changes the up and down buttons to left and right

10.23.19  12:23 pm   I thought my name was James but it turns out it's actually [REDACTED]. What should I do?

     well the first thing you'll want to do is redact the hell out of it, which it looks like you've already done. then just when you think it's been fully redacted, try to redact it just a little bit more

10.23.19  12:11 pm   What is a train

     it's like a car with wheels

10.23.19  12:05 pm   what is the secret to your silky ear caressing voice

     smoked silk

10.23.19  12:04 pm   what is your opion on the phrase "ooga booga"

     it's good

10.23.19  11:39 am   Is Loud Lenny in "Late Night Lounge With Loud Lenny" (first instrumental on this website) a real person?

     not yet

10.23.19  11:17 am   Out of all of them, can rank your favourite numbers? Doesn't have to be in order

     1

10.23.19  10:43 am   10.21.19  9:05 pm thank you for continuing to have a playful spirit when answering some of the questions it brightens up my days

     i have an electric shocking device which electrocutes me if i take too many questions too seriously. damn it, just got shocked again

10.23.19  10:17 am   is the internet a good place to get more brian cells?

     yes, and entire brains too

10.23.19  9:49 am   Bill, the Illuminati has invited me, but i don't want to go. Do you have a secret society i can join? 

     yes. oops not anymore

10.23.19  9:34 am   Hey, I was wondering if you have tips on making music.

     you can try to make music, but in the end it will make you

10.23.19  9:28 am   where do you place your keyboards? i find it hard to imagine a way to place 9 keyboards while being able to reach all of them comfortably.

     currently like this

      also have you considered harnessing the power of modifier keys to multiply the amount of combinations available?

     that is a secondary strategy, behind the primary strategy of having as many unmodified keys available as possible

      something like foot pedals

     foot controls are very important, but not as modifiers for other keys, they will be used as their own function, and they probably won't be buttons, they will be value range pedals

10.23.19  8:52 am   do i need to buy more food coloring?

      how much do you have

10.23.19  8:38 am   how content are you with the work you've been doing as of late?

     pretty good although i am just laying the ground work still. ground work needs to be strong, looking to put some heavy shit on it

      do you feel like you are bettering yourself? 

     yes. almost too much bettering, might drown, help

10.23.19  8:36 am   hey tim, is there a special reason behind the fact that the top of this page says "ueqstions" instead of the classic "questions"?

     it doesn't say ueqstions, it says ueqstions. but here is an example of what it would look like with 'questions' instead, and i think you'll see for yourself

10.23.19  8:19 am   does existence make any sense

     it's the only thing that's interesting. if there were no existence, it would make perfect sense why you would start to want that

      or are we just living to die?

     living to live, and possibly dying by mistake or due to some weakness

10.23.19  8:14 am   are future people spying on us

     they will be

10.23.19  8:12 am   would you ever differentiate a song from a video,

     i always have, but i am thinking of doing it less

      like interspersing the song with spoken word at various points in the video version?

     i think it's better to intersperse songs/parts of songs amongst a broader video

10.23.19  7:06 am   if mcdonalds sells fried chicken,

     they don't always

      why doesn't kfc sell beefburgers?

     they do sometimes

10.23.19  6:37 am   what can i ask here

     anything that's already been asked

10.23.19  6:07 am   do you think that one-hump camels ever get jealous of two-hump camels?

     no, the two-hump camels are jealous of the one hump camels and they are both jealous of horses

10.23.19  5:06 am   People say humans learn more from their failures than successes. What was a failed experience for you, like your favorite?

     i can't tell you

      And what did you learn?

     not to tell anyone my failures

10.23.19  4:58 am   have you watched the bee movie?

     i have people who watch it for me

10.23.19  4:50 am   how do study good

     teach

10.23.19  4:03 am   how did you/what did you use to make this website?

     mostly textedit

10.23.19  3:37 am   what is your faverite punctuation mark

     ,

10.23.19  1:21 am   How much time do you spend answering questions each day?

     about 10 years

10.23.19  1:12 am   wow seems like people really want to know when your next video comes out... do know why these people are so impatient?

     not having to make the videos, that could free up a lot of time to be impatient

10.23.19  12:43 am   Got the sheet music for the road on hand anywhere?  I know I'm supposed to learn by ear but I still like seeing it :-|  

     i have the first draft on paper. but it went through some changes before it was recorded, and that version is not on physical paper nor on a staff

10.23.19  12:23 am   rice?

      that would be ok

10.22.19  11:51 pm   what's your weirdest dream?

     probably this one

10.22.19  11:45 pm   what's your favorite letter in the alphabet?

     the only thing that does it for me anymore is words

10.22.19  11:42 pm   Not a question but you are indeed a smart and talented individual.

     we'll see about that

10.22.19  11:18 pm   is the random selection on your store randomly chosen from what's there or is it literally just what the heck ever you decide it is?

     it's probably random, but if there is a person deciding it would not be me, it would be someone working at DFTBA

10.22.19  10:24 pm   do you like your own creations?

     it's my job to make them how i like them

10.22.19  9:55 pm   are you gonna answer any more questions?

     i will think about it

10.22.19  9:32 pm   Is a new vid coming up?

     we're changing the definition of vid, and then yes. vid is likely to occur. forecast for heavy vid rain

10.22.19  9:21 pm   bill you're close to a breakthrough aren't you.

     yes

      i can feel it

10.22.19  9:03 pm   i dont know what to put here so i have to ask

how are you able to make constant slaps yet be funny all at the same time

     if you slap it at an askewed angle, it makes a nice briskful whisking sound, and also gives it that slantward tilt it may have needed

10.22.19  8:52 pm   are there some questions even you couldn't answer

     i can't answer any of them. that's what makes it so much fun to answer them. it's like doing the impossible

10.22.19  8:48 pm   Who asks you all these questions?

     you, for example

10.22.19  8:37 pm   Do you think Daft Punk will never make music again because it'll be impossible to top Random Access Memories? 

     if you need to top something, you can always turn it sideways. this may not work for building bridges, but wow as hell does it damn work for music

10.22.19  8:19 pm   can you sing the alphabet backwards

     yes

10.22.19  7:32 pm   What is a dog?

     some kind of land dolphin
